languages.text: Команда Вольного Торговца наткнулась на разграбленные останки древнего имперского судна. Среди скудной добычи обнаружилась замысловатая деталь, которую служители Машинного культа определили как часть археотечного механизма неизвестного назначения. Удивительная находка!

traits.locale_text: Команда Вольного Торговца наткнулась на разграбленные останки древнего имперского судна. Среди скудной добычи обнаружилась замысловатая деталь, которую служители Культа Машины определили как часть археотечного механизма неизвестного назначения. Удивительная находка!

languages.text: The Rogue Trader's crew stumbled upon the plundered remnants of an ancient Imperial vessel. An intricate component was discovered among the meagre pickings that remained, and servants of the Machine Cult identified it as a piece of an archeotech mechanism, its purpose unknown. A remarkable find!
languages.original_text: Команда Вольного Торговца наткнулась на разграбленные останки древнего имперского судна. Среди скудной добычи обнаружилась замысловатая деталь, которую служители Машинного культа определили как часть археотечного механизма неизвестного назначения. Удивительная находка!

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's crew stumbled upon the plundered remnants of an ancient Imperial vessel. An intricate component was discovered among the meagre pickings that remained, and servants of the Machine Cult identified it as a piece of an archeotech mechanism, its purpose unknown. A remarkable find!

The Rogue Trader's crew stumbled upon the plundered remnants of an ancient Imperial vessel. An intricate component was discovered among the meagre pickings that remained, and servants of the Machine Cult identified it as a piece of an archeotech mechanism, its purpose unknown. A remarkable find!

languages.text: 行商浪人的船员偶然发现了一艘古代帝国舰船的残骸。这艘舰船已经遭到了掠夺，船员们在所剩无几的资源中发现了一个复杂的零件。机械修会的成员认为这是远古科技造物的零件，用途不明。真是个了不起的发现！
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew stumbled upon the plundered remnants of an ancient Imperial vessel. An intricate component was discovered among the meagre pickings that remained, and servants of the Machine Cult identified it as a piece of an archeotech mechanism, its purpose unknown. A remarkable find!

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的船员偶然发现了一艘古代帝国舰船的残骸。这艘舰船已经遭到了掠夺，船员们在所剩无几的资源中发现了一个复杂的零件。机械修会的成员认为这是远古科技造物的零件，用途不明。真是个了不起的发现！

languages.text: 自由開拓者のクルーは、古代帝国の略奪された船の残骸を発見した。残っていたわずかな物資の中から複雑な部品が発見され、機械教団の使用人たちはそれが技術遺産の機構の一部であることを特定したが、その目的は不明なままだった。注目に値する発見だ！
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew stumbled upon the plundered remnants of an ancient Imperial vessel. An intricate component was discovered among the meagre pickings that remained, and servants of the Machine Cult identified it as a piece of an archeotech mechanism, its purpose unknown. A remarkable find!

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者のクルーは、古代帝国の略奪された船の残骸を発見した。残っていたわずかな物資の中から複雑な部品が発見され、機械教団の使用人たちはそれが技術遺産の機構の一部であることを特定したが、その目的は不明なままだった。注目に値する発見だ！

languages.text: La tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se ha cruzado con los restos saqueados de una antigua nave Imperial. Entre los exiguos restos destaca un complejo componente que los sirvientes del Culto Máquina han identificado como parte de un mecanismo de arqueotecnología de finalidad desconocida. ¡Es algo singular!
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew stumbled upon the plundered remnants of an ancient Imperial vessel. An intricate component was discovered among the meagre pickings that remained, and servants of the Machine Cult identified it as a piece of an archeotech mechanism, its purpose unknown. A remarkable find!

traits.locale_text: La tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente se ha cruzado con los restos saqueados de una antigua nave Imperial. Entre los exiguos restos destaca un complejo componente que los sirvientes del Culto Máquina han identificado como parte de un mecanismo de arqueotecnología de finalidad desconocida. ¡Es algo singular!

languages.text: Die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist auf die geplünderten Überreste eines alten imperialen Schiffes gestoßen. Die magere Ausbeute bei seiner Untersuchung umfasste eine faszinierende Komponente, die von Dienern des Maschinenkultes als Teil eines unbekannten Archäotech-Mechanismus' identifiziert wurde. Ein bemerkenswerter Fund!
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew stumbled upon the plundered remnants of an ancient Imperial vessel. An intricate component was discovered among the meagre pickings that remained, and servants of the Machine Cult identified it as a piece of an archeotech mechanism, its purpose unknown. A remarkable find!

traits.locale_text: Die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist auf die geplünderten Überreste eines alten imperialen Schiffes gestoßen. Die magere Ausbeute bei seiner Untersuchung umfasste eine faszinierende Komponente, die von Dienern des Maschinenkultes als Teil eines unbekannten Archäotech-Mechanismus' identifiziert wurde. Ein bemerkenswerter Fund!

languages.text: L'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} est tombé sur les vestiges pillés d'un ancien vaisseau impérial. Un composant complexe a été retrouvé parmi les rares objets restants, et les serviteurs du culte de la machine l'ont identifié comme faisant partie d'un mécanisme archéotechnologique dont ils ignorent tout. Une trouvaille remarquable !
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew stumbled upon the plundered remnants of an ancient Imperial vessel. An intricate component was discovered among the meagre pickings that remained, and servants of the Machine Cult identified it as a piece of an archeotech mechanism, its purpose unknown. A remarkable find!

traits.locale_text: L'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} est tombé sur les vestiges pillés d'un ancien vaisseau impérial. Un composant complexe a été retrouvé parmi les rares objets restants, et les serviteurs du culte de la machine l'ont identifié comme faisant partie d'un mécanisme archéotechnologique dont ils ignorent tout. Une trouvaille remarquable !

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in mürettebatı, kadim bir İmparatorluk gemisinin yağmalanmış kalıntılarına denk geldi. Kalan, alınmaya değer az sayıdaki şeyin içinde karmaşık bir bileşen keşfedildi. Makine Tarikatı'nın hizmetkârları, bunun bir arkeotek mekanizmasının parçası olduğunu tespit etti. İşlevi ise bilinmiyor. Muazzam bir keşif!
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew stumbled upon the plundered remnants of an ancient Imperial vessel. An intricate component was discovered among the meagre pickings that remained, and servants of the Machine Cult identified it as a piece of an archeotech mechanism, its purpose unknown. A remarkable find!

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in mürettebatı kadim bir İmparatorluk gemisinin yağmalanmış kalıntılarına denk geldi. Kalan, alınmaya değer az sayıdaki şeyin içinde, karmaşık bir bileşen keşfedildi ve Makine Tarikatı'nın hizmetkârları bunun bir arkeotek mekanizmanın bir parçası olduğunu tespit etti. İşlevi ise bilinmiyor. Muazzam bir keşif!
